name: Gonna Cry in Hell
description:
In this game the idea is to get all the knowledge acquired by the gamer about mechanics of the games in general, and throw them away.

it is time to desconstruct all of your accumulated knowledge and cross hell itself looking for a way out.

The solution may be pretty simple.

Team:

Alisson Meneghello - Artist

Gabriel Cassimiro - Programmer

Henrique Del Nero - Artist/Game Designer

Leonardo Dantas - Tech Artist/Level Designer

How to Play:

  

 Press ESC to return to the menu
